lwjgl.test

Class VBOTestTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • lwjgl.core.RenderTarget
      • lwjgl.test.VBOTestTarget

  • public class VBOTestTarget
extends lwjgl.core.RenderTarget
    Test Target to test functionality of Vertex Buffer Objects.
    For more information, visit http://www.ozone3d.net/tutorials/opengl_vbo.php
